Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.

.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.

Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!

Brandom Kitchens and Bath Design Center has grown into a trusted brand from humble beginnings in March, 1989. What began as a small rental unit on Bloor St. in Oshawa, has grown in size and tenure to the 9,000 sq ft warehouse we design from today. Our guests and repeat clients enjoy being greeted by Cheryl or Tony, before strolling through our showroom with a refreshment to gain inspiration from our many displays showcasing new products from the countries leading suppliers. Brandom takes great pride in offering a beginning-to-end approach as a team. Our clients will never find themselves shopping sections of department stores or sourcing tradespeople. Our experience has gained the confidence of many, and results in productivity while honouring our clients schedule and budget. We enjoy every step of the renovation process, from measuring and designing the space, to installing the cabinets, flooring, reworking plumbing, safely updating electrical needs, and as needed will remove walls, counters, backsplash, and dispose of all accumulated excess.

DIY's can be enticing but renovations by inexperienced contractors or labourers can quickly become expensive and stressful. 

Once a client has agreed to partner with us, our design team will present a 3D render of the discussed vision to be approved or amended, before any work commences in your home. We bring more than fifty years of aggregate experience ensuring an enjoyable, creative experience transforming their favourite space. 
In addition to primary design, our team is present for our clients during all facets of the installation, manufacturing processes and future service. 

Our team wouldn't be complete without our in-house installers who bring the design element to life with precision and care. Our installers consistently deliver excellence while showing the utmost care for remaining flooring and furniture. Installers are available upon request to revisit the site for services if needed. (All electrical and plumbing work is performed to code standards).

We are grateful for every new and returning client for making Brandom Durham's trusted design studio.

Call Cheryl today to schedule your first appointment. Our family is looking forward to working with yours!
